The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of April 2005 by Amicus for Amicus Curiae to Participate in Oral Argument:

"Motion Allowed. Amicus (Phase II Beneficiaries) granted five minutes of Appellant's time. By order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of May 2005."
